Package com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

Class Character

java.lang.Object
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
GnarledRootBeast, MagicMoose
public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a Character prototype, suitable for use in a Role-Playing Game.
Author:
piedas

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int currentHealth
    Current health for the character as an integer value.
    private int maxHealth
    Max health for the character as an integer value.
    private int strength
    Strength of the character as an integer value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Character()
    This constructor uses the DiceBag class to randomize the max health and strength of the character at creation.
    Character​(int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
    This constructor allows specific values to be set.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract Attack attack()
    /** This abstract method's implementation methods should be able to invoke the attack and return the related information.
    abstract AttackReport defend​(Attack attack)
    This is an abstract class indicating the method requires an Attack object to be passed into the method as the attack information to help the character to analyze the type and choose the defend logic.
    void fullRecover()
    This is a convenience method, it simply changes the currentHealth to match the maxHealth.
    int getCurrentHealth()
    Gets the current health of this character
    int getMaxHealth()
    Gets max health for this character, method fullRecover() will use this value to update the currentHealth
    int getStrength()
    Gets the strength for this character, strength is used as part of attack calculations for this character
    java.lang.String getTypeClassName()
    Reports the class name for this instance, it also removes any package information returning only the class name itself.
    void setCurrentHealth​(int currentHealth)
    Sets a new value for the current health of this character
    void setMaxHealth​(int maxHealth)
    Sets the max Health value for this character, there is no data validation.
    void setStrength​(int strength)
    Sets the strength for this character, there is no data validation.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Provides a String representation for this Character, formatted as "type: %s, max health: %d, current health %d, strength: %d" A new-line character is not added to the end of the String

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • maxHealth

      private int maxHealth
      Max health for the character as an integer value.

    • strength

      Strength of the character as an integer value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character()
      This constructor uses the DiceBag class to randomize the max health and strength of the character at creation. maxHealth will be 10 to 200 (inclusive), strength will be 3 to 18 (inclusive). The current health is set to be the same as the maxHealth.
      See Also:
      DiceBag

    • Character

      public Character​(int maxHealth, int currentHealth, int strength)
      This constructor allows specific values to be set.
      Parameters:
      maxHealth - the maximum health of the character
      currentHealth - the current health of the character
      strength - the strength of the character

  • Method Details

    • getTypeClassName

      public java.lang.String getTypeClassName()
      Reports the class name for this instance, it also removes any package information returning only the class name itself.
      Returns:
      name of the class definition for this object

    • getMaxHealth

      public int getMaxHealth()
      Gets max health for this character, method fullRecover() will use this value to update the currentHealth
      Returns:
      maximum health of this character

    • setMaxHealth

      public void setMaxHealth​(int maxHealth)
      Sets the max Health value for this character, there is no data validation.
      Parameters:
      maxHealth - maximum health for this character

    • getCurrentHealth

      public int getCurrentHealth()
      Gets the current health of this character
      Returns:
      current health of this character

    • setCurrentHealth

      public void setCurrentHealth​(int currentHealth)
      Sets a new value for the current health of this character
      Parameters:
      currentHealth - current health for this character

    • getStrength

      public int getStrength()
      Gets the strength for this character, strength is used as part of attack calculations for this character
      Returns:
      The strength of this character

    • setStrength

      public void setStrength​(int strength)
      Sets the strength for this character, there is no data validation.
      Parameters:
      strength - strength for this character

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Provides a String representation for this Character, formatted as "type: %s, max health: %d, current health %d, strength: %d" A new-line character is not added to the end of the String
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • attack

      public abstract Attack attack()
      /** This abstract method's implementation methods should be able to invoke the attack and return the related information.
      Returns:
      the Attack information about the damage amount it contains

    • defend

      public abstract AttackReport defend​(Attack attack)
      This is an abstract class indicating the method requires an Attack object to be passed into the method as the attack information to help the character to analyze the type and choose the defend logic.
      Parameters:
      attack - the attack object set up by the character's opponent.
      Returns:
      the defend report showing the actual damage that has been caused.

    • fullRecover

      public void fullRecover()
      This is a convenience method, it simply changes the currentHealth to match the maxHealth.
